skills.title: Front-end Development
skills.description: Frontend development is my true passion, where creativity meets technology. I love bringing designs to life, creating user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile.

skills.title: Back-end Development
skills.description: additionally, I enjoy collaborating with backend technologies to ensure seamless functionality and optimal user experiences.

education.title: Bachelor of Software Engineering Honours Undergraduate
education.description: In 2020, I commenced my higher education journey at the Open University of Sri Lanka. Currently in my third year, I anticipate completing my degree program by 2024.

education.title: General Certificate of Education (Advanced Level)
education.description: In 2019, I undertook the GCE A/L exam, in the Engineering Technology stream. I successfully passed the exam, with a focus on the Information Technology subject.

certificate.title: Sololearn Certificates
certificate.description: I have successfully completed courses in PHP, Python Data Structure, JavaScript, Python for Beginners, and Java on the Sololearn platform.

certificate.title: Postman API Fundamentals Student Expert
certificate.description: I have successfully earned a student-level credential for completing the "Postman API Fundamentals Student Expert" course offered by Postman Academy.

certificate.title: Introduction to Data Science
certificate.description: I have successfully earned a student-level credential for completing the "Introduction to Data Science" course offered by Cisco Network Academy.

certificate.title: Google Analytics for Beginners
certificate.description: I have successfully completed the course "Google Analytics for Beginners" offered by Google Analytics Academy powerd by Google.

certificate.title: Design Thinking
certificate.description: I have successfully completed the free online course titled "Design Thinking" provided by Great Learning Academy.

certificate.title: Programming for Everybody (Python)
certificate.description: I have successfully completed the online non-credit course titled "Programming for Everybody (Getting Started with Python)," authorized by the University of Michigan and offered through Coursera.

portfolio.title: Exchange Rate Cal
portfolio.description: This is a simple exchange rate calculator that allows users to convert between different currencies. It fetches real-time exchange rate data from an external API and provides an easy-to-use interface for currency conversion. It's made by using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

portfolio.title: Luckey Web Game
portfolio.description: Just launched my fun number guessing game, Luckey! It's made by using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Try your luck and guess the number between 0 and 10. The colorful luck meter changes based on your performance. Can you reach "So Lucky"?

portfolio.title: University of Srilanka
portfolio.description: This is a website made for the University of Sri Lanka YouTube channel using HTML, CSS, and JS. Whether you're a interested in higher education, this YouTube Channel delivers valuable insights. Stay updated with informative videos on higher education.

portfolio.title: Tech Mentor
portfolio.description: The Tech Mentor University web page project. It's created by HTML, CSS, and Js. This project serves as the official web page for Tech Mentor University, providing students and visitors with access to course details, university news, offers, contact information, and registration details.

portfolio.title: To-Do
portfolio.description: This is a simple To-Do List web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. You can use this to manage your tasks and keep track of your daily activities. This app is the perfect way to stay organized and on top of your tasks. It's simple and easy to handle.

portfolio.title: Resto UI/UX
portfolio.description: Resto is a platform where clients will be able to make their orders in the restaurants easily by using this application. It is made by using Adobe XD. They can find restaurants and check their menu of food. After the order clients can pay it and after they can track the order.

portfolio.title: Coffeemate
portfolio.description: Coffeemate, an Android app built with Java using Android Studio, is a social media platform that helps people combat loneliness by connecting them with nearby individuals. Users can connect based on shared interests, fostering meaningful connections.

portfolio.title: GPA Calculator
portfolio.description: This is a simple GPA calculator web application built using basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This web-based GPA calculator that allows users to input their university subjects, grades, credits, and after calculate their current GPA value and Total Credits.

portfolio.title: OBUDDY Website
portfolio.description: OBUDDY is packed with features that cater to the needs of students and encourage social engagement within the campus community and this web for promoting OBUDDY mobile application. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Tiny Slider, Font Awesome, and Venobox.

portfolio.title: Apollo Car Service
portfolio.description: The Apollo Car Service is a web template for you made of HTML, CSS, and Js. This project showcases a professional and responsive website for an automobile service business. Whether you're a car owner looking for top-notch servicing, Apollo Car Service has you covered.

portfolio.title: OBUDDY
portfolio.description: OBUDDY is a mobile app made with Flutter to help students connect and build friendships on campus. Allowing students to communicate and form meaningful relationships within their campus. This app has a lot of features like chatting, posting, and checking availability.

portfolio.title: Hades
portfolio.description: Wondering about the time left on your life's clock? Embrace the journey with this app that calculates your estimated death day and sets up a countdown to make every moment count. Don't be serious just enjoy! This application build with Flutter framework.

portfolio.title: PIXMATO
portfolio.description: PIXMATO, is your e-commerce destination for exquisite wall art. Immerse yourself in a seamless shopping experience powered by ReactJS and SCSS. Explore our collection, where creativity meets craftsmanship, on a visually stunning website designed for PIXMATO.

portfolio.title: INTECSSL UI/UX
portfolio.description: The UI for INTECSSL, meticulously designed using Figma, reflects the company's dedication to professionalism and attention to detail. From sleek layouts to intuitive ui, every element is thoughtfully crafted to provide a seamless and engaging experience for visitors.

portfolio.title: CeylonX
portfolio.description: CeylonX, a leading software solution company, offering cutting-edge technology solutions to empower businesses worldwide. As my first internship experience, developing their main company website using Next.js with Firebase marks a significant milestone in my journey.

portfolio.title: Fortude Sound Therapy
portfolio.description: Sound Therapy by Fortude, a serene and immersive sound controlling website developed by FORTUDE, offers users a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. I developed it using React.js. With Sound Therapy, users can control sounds and relax mind with it.

portfolio.title: Kina Rain
portfolio.description: Kina Rain is an exciting and immersive gambling website designed to provide users with an exhilarating gaming experience. Developed using React.js and Firebase. Users can easily participate in their favorite games and compete for lucrative prizes and rewards.
